statements: UPDATE public_transportation_usage SET fare = 25.50 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE public_transportation_usage SET start_station = 'Station A', end_station = 'Station B' WHERE route_id = 101 AND travel_date = '2022-11-30';
UPDATE public_transportation_usage SET fare = 15.50, end_station = 'Station B' WHERE user_id = 'b760aeb6-64e7-4695-b3fc-cb77d995ebe4';
UPDATE public_transportation_usage SET start_station = 'Station A', route_id = 101, travel_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE user_id = 'f0e36a2b-f72a-4edb-8a86-62e687e3d02d';
UPDATE public_transportation_users SET user_name = 'Alice', total_rides = total_rides + 1 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE public_transportation_rides SET start_location = 'Station A', ride_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE ride_id = 5;
UPDATE public_transportation_users SET user_age = 35, total_rides = total_rides + 1 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE public_transportation_rides SET start_location = 'Downtown', end_location = 'Airport' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE public_transportation_users SET user_name = 'John Doe', user_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = '77db18c4-64c8-4b89-92b3-5b117ea510d0';
UPDATE transportation_routes SET start_location = 'City A', end_location = 'City B', route_type = 'Express' WHERE route_id = '8296b5da-7c4b-4855-b746-9f2754b7e72c';
UPDATE public_transportation_users SET user_name = 'John Doe', user_age = 30 WHERE user_id = 'b155fcb1-ae5c-4ce3-ba61-eeda677572db';
UPDATE transportation_routes SET route_type = 'Train', start_location = 'Station A', end_location = 'Station B' WHERE route_id = 'e9c3e0a1-9e8e-43d5-be15-6b97dff82dd2';
UPDATE public_transport_routes SET frequency = 10 WHERE route_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
UPDATE public_transport_stops SET stop_location = 'Downtown' WHERE stop_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002'
UPDATE public_transport_stops SET total_passengers = total_passengers + 100 WHERE stop_id = 'ae3abc47-22cf-4e1a-ae32-4fb59de8fd17';
UPDATE public_transport_routes SET frequency = 10, route_description = 'Updated description' WHERE route_id = '7e9ff3c2-1e70-45a6-968f-7a1cadb1ff68';
UPDATE Users SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE Trips SET fare = 25.99, trip_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE trip_id = 100;
UPDATE Users SET user_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE Tickets SET ticket_type = 'Regular', ticket_price = 15.50 WHERE ticket_id = 100;
